filterType.caption: Filter
filterType.helptext: Type of the filter. The possible values are ram-lak filter (default) or none (for simple back projection).

filterSize.caption: Filter size
filterSize.helptext: The size of the filter. Typically, the filter width should correspond to the width of the input projections and the rest should be 1 (i.e. 300,1,1 for input projections of size 300 x Y).

filterInFourierSpace.caption: Use filtering in Fourier space
filterInFourierSpace.helptext: Use for filtering in Fourier space.
